Biochips come in two main types : the microfluidics chip or " lab - on - a - chip , " and the microarray chip or " DNA chip . "in two main types : the microfluidics chip or " lab - on - a - chip , " and the microarray chip or " DNA chip	2|29
++++++3613++++++

Tanshui Facts and Figures++++++3804++++++
Tanshui Township -LRB- also spelled Tamsui -RRB- is part of Taipei County .++++++3805++++++
It abuts Sanchih Rural Township to the northeast , the Kuantu area of Taipei City to the southeast , and the Taiwan Strait to the northwest ; to the southwest it faces Pali Rural Township over the Tanshui River .++++++3806++++++
It covers an area of just over 70 square kilometers , and has a population of 115,000 .an area of just over 70 square kilometers	2|10
just over 70 square kilometers	5|10
++++++3807++++++
It is the largest paddy - rice producing area in Taipei County .++++++3808++++++
In days gone by , because the Kuroshio current passes close by , the waters offshore were rich fishing grounds .days gone by	1|4
close by	10|12
++++++3809++++++
However , in recent years , pollution from the Tanshui River and exhaustion of fish stocks have caused the catch to dwindle .pollution from the Tanshui River	6|11
the catch to dwindle	18|22
pollution from the Tanshui River and exhaustion of fish stocks	6|16
++++++3810++++++

the historic buildings of the Mackay Hospital and Tamkang Middle School	48|59
the Mackay Hospital and Tamkang Middle School	52|59

Ugly duckling no more++++++3838++++++
The wax apple is a tropical fruit originating from the Malay peninsula .a tropical fruit originating from the Malay peninsula	4|12
a tropical fruit originating from the Malay peninsula	4|12
++++++3839++++++

as a shade - giving tree	19|25
++++++3840++++++

++++++3842++++++
For example , the " bag - wrap " method was originally a way of protecting budding fruit from birds , but once it was introduced to Linpien , in around 1994 , farmers found it enabled them to grow more lustrous , shiny - looking wax apples , with less pesticide on the skin .the " bag - wrap " method	3|10
a way of protecting budding fruit from birds	12|20

++++++3844++++++

++++++3845++++++
This reduces the amount of sunlight reaching the trees , causing nutrients from the leaves and branches to be diverted into producing fruit .the amount of sunlight reaching the trees	2|9

++++++3862++++++

++++++3865++++++

++++++3866++++++

in any criminal case	15|19
++++++5181++++++

++++++5910++++++
